      • isDebug

        public static boolean isDebug()
        To get the Debug functionality in OSU JAR
        Returns:
        true Debug if is Enabled otherwise false.

      • isNFCDisableRequired

        public static boolean isNFCDisableRequired()
        To check if NFC Disable required
        Returns:
        true if NFC functionality support required.

      • isNfcResetReqd

        public static boolean isNfcResetReqd()
        To check if NFC Reset required
        Returns:
        true if NFC reset is required.

      • setNFCDisableRequired

        public static void setNFCDisableRequired​(boolean value)
        To set if NFC Disable is required or not
        Parameters:
        value - : value to be set for NFC Disable required.

      • getSharedPreferenceKey

        public static java.lang.String getSharedPreferenceKey()
        Returns the key to access the shared preference of OSU JAR
        Returns:
        : String value of the key to access shared preferance of OSU JAR

      • getLoggerPath

        public static java.lang.String getLoggerPath()
        To get response logger file path of OSU JAR
        Returns:
        : String FilePath of response logger if response logging is opened otherwise null if currently No file is opened.

      • isOpened

        public static boolean isOpened()
        To check if any response logger file is opened
        Returns:
        : boolean true if any file is opened otherwise false.

      • open

        public static void open​(Context context)
        To create and open new logging response file this will create a file on /data/data path of associated application context.
        Parameters:
        context - : Application context for file path

      • write

        public static void write​(java.lang.String msg,
                         boolean addTime)
        To write on opened response logger file
        Parameters:
        msg - : String Message to write on file.
        addTime - : boolean flag to indicate whether to add time prefix of message or not.

      • write

        public static void write​(byte[] msg,
                         boolean addTime)
        To write on opened response logger file
        Parameters:
        msg - : byte array of message will be converted as HEX string to write on file.
        addTime - : boolean flag to indicate whether to add time prefix of message or not.

      • close

        public static void close()
        To close the currently opened logging file
